summary: Build a training/knowledge website for AAA Lawyers focused on accident management systems in NSW, Australia, including courses and guidance on recovering costs from at-fault insurers and dealing with insurance companies, using a provided PDF as the primary source.
architectural_notes: Primary content source is a provided PDF; site content should be derived from and aligned to that document.
Jurisdiction and scope: NSW, Australia accident management and insurer recovery processes.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- AAA Lawyers wordmark logo, clean typographic style (aaa-lawyers-logo.dim_512x256.png)
- Hero banner illustration themed around training/learning and document review (nsw-training-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of 3 simple monochrome icons: book, graduation cap, shield (training-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public-facing website for the firm name “AAA Lawyers” that provides a structured knowledge base and training courses focused on accident management systems in NSW, Australia.
Add a PDF-source ingestion workflow so administrators can use the provided PDF as the primary source for knowledge base articles and course content.

Implement a Knowledge Base section containing navigable articles derived from the PDF covering NSW accident management systems, recovery process from at-fault insurers, and guidance for dealing with insurance companies in NSW.

Implement a Training Courses section with structured courses (course → modules/lessons) that trainees can follow to improve product knowledge related to NSW accident management and insurer recovery processes.
Add trainee sign-in using Internet Identity and track per-user learning progress (e.g., lesson completion and overall course progress).
Add lightweight knowledge checks for courses (e.g., short quizzes per module/lesson) so trainees can self-assess understanding.
Provide an admin-only content management area to create/edit/publish/unpublish Knowledge Base articles, Courses, Lessons, and Quizzes, including managing content derived from the PDF.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme suitable for a professional NSW legal training site (consistent colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across all pages.
Add basic site pages and navigation: Home, Knowledge Base, Courses, About AAA Lawyers, and a Contact page (static contact details placeholder text only, no email/SMS integrations).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a training/knowledge website for AAA Lawyers on accident management systems in NSW (Australia)
Develop training course content covering recovery process from the at-fault insurer in NSW
Add learning modules/guidance on how to deal with insurance companies in NSW for trainee product knowledge improvement
Ingest and use the provided PDF as the primary content/source for the website knowledge base and courses

projectName: AAA Lawyers NSW Accident Management Training Website
